snippet.title: LOVESICK // Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
PUZZLE // PUNK // ESCAPE // TOUR // 
Coming 2025, Wishlist for Meta Quest: https://www.meta.com/experiences/lovesick/3587422908007953/
Wishlist on SteamVR: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3048100/LOVESICK

After a grueling tour that has left them drained and flat broke, a struggling post-punk band returns home. The group is already on the brink of collapse when a supernatural event dubbed “the Feedback” plunges them all into a twisted alternate reality.
